name: Don't push the button!
description:
Are you in a dark room? Or is it a black floor?
Simple, but challenging speedrunning game made for the Lux Jam.

P.S.: The itch.io web build doesn't seem to work for some reason. You might have to download an executable down below.

Controls:

Move: WASD
Jump: Space
Ground Pound & Swap: Shift or left click

Warning: You retrieve your momentum after swapping, so don't swap after falling from a jump if you're in a tight situation!

Also, if you're wondering why the jumps are so weird, my code was so messy that I couldn't make gravity compensate for lag properly.
